WorkItem.Description:
James, once again thanks for your effort! Simple OOXML really is a great library, and i already voted it 5*.
 
one issue though, when you use .PasteDataTable to past a DataTable that contains a typeof(float) column with a CultureInfo other than "en-US" (like "de-AT" in my case), the resulting .xlsx file is corrupt. this might have something to do with the fact that in Europe the comma "," is used as decimal separator.
when i do a "Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture = new CultureInfo("en-US");" before exporting the .xlsx file everything works as expected.
 
for your reference i've attached a corrupt Excel file.
 
thanks,
Tom
WorkItem.Summary: .PasteDataTable results in a corrupt .xlsx file when pasting a DataTable that contains typeof(float) columns with a CultureInfo other than "en-US"

Comments.Message: Fixed and uploaded to source. Will be in next build.
